channel.title: Can i run a server through Hamachi?
channel.description: i dont want to portfoward so can i run a server through hamachi ?? also anyone have good server source , another question is wat ip i tell people to connect to for my server?? i made the rs2fun.no-ip.biz do i tell them that or my pc IP ?? :confused: sorry im new to this so im trying to learn

item.title: Can i run a server through Hamachi?
item.dc:creator: @KaptainKoolAidz KaptainKoolAidz
item.description:
@KaptainKoolAidz wrote:

If your running through hamachi it will be the IP at the top of the hamachi window.and they can only connect via hamachi if your in the same room.

Read full topic
item.source: Can i run a server through Hamachi?
